sentence: His works have been short listed for the Booker Prize five times, in 1981 for Midnight's Children, 1983 for Shame, 1988 for The Satanic Verses, 1995 for The Moor's Last Sigh, 2019 for Quichotte.

positive_examples.sentence: ...one of the best science fiction short stories of the pre nebula...
